The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 September is 336,622 (598 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 15 September, there were 18,175 new confirmed cases (32.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 September, there were 18,537 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (362 fewer cases).
